description: Query a snapshot of the most recent connection states.

network_watcher_name.description: The name of the Network Watcher resource.

connection_monitor_name.description: The name given to the connection monitor.

subscription_id.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group containing Network Watcher.
